did.unittitle: Francis, Mark. 4 Millay Songs for Mezzo Soprano and Piano

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score, 1 CD. Notes: submission letter and biographical letter housed with 3 Roethke songs for the baritone and piano. The CD and a duplicate of the score were in a manila envelope on which was written "Kentucky New Music Festival, Sop/Mz-sop submissions." Note on envelope: FM2.1 .04, FM2.2 .03.
